compound: Dronabinol 2.5mg BID vs Megestrol 800mg/day vs Combination
effect_size: Medium for dronabinol; large for megestrol
notes: Megestrol vs Dronabinol vs Combination for Cancer Cachexia
abstract: Appetite ≥10%: Dronabinol 49%, Megestrol 75%, Combo 66%; Weight gain ≥10%: Dronabinol 3%, Megestrol 11%
